title: "The $64k Question: How Does AI Phishing Stack Up Against Human Social Engineers?"
excerpt: "The outcome of the investigation is that AI can produce a phish considerably faster than humans (five minutes from five simple prompts compared to 16 hours for the IBM human social engineers); but that human social engineering is currently more effective than AI phishing."
